he Tarrik Dynasty, which was also referred to as the Demon Dynasty, briefly ruled over the nation of Impiltur from 726 DR to 729 DR. 
 King Argosh the Scaled  Reigned 726 DR â€“ 729 DR. Argosh was a half-fiend son of a duke who claimed the throne after the death of King Forvar II.
